About Me


Creator

Hello,
My Name is Theo Bouras and i am a former online microstakes tournament poker player that used to grind periodically under the nickname trixakias. All the years i was playing poker, whenever i found myself at short stack situations i was shoving accordingly to Nash Equillibrium PDF charts i used to have and it worked pretty well i can tell.
I am also a passionate developer so i decided to take those charts and make this free tool in order to help you.
You can help me also if you want, by consider donating here for my effort creating ShoveBoss.
